original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and walked in the way of his father and in the way of his mother and in the way of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
korean_text: 그가 여호와 앞에서 악을 행하여 그의 아버지의 길과 그의 어머니의 길과 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 길로 행하며

sentences.original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
and walked in the way of his father
and in the way of his mother
and in the way of Jeroboam the son of Nebat
